original_text:
The guests in my house and my maidservants count me as a stranger;
    I have become a foreigner in their eyes.
korean_text: 내 집에 머물러 사는 자와 내 여종들은 나를 낯선 사람으로 여기니 내가 그들 앞에서 타국 사람이 되었구나

sentences.original_text: The guests in my house and my maidservants
I have become a foreigner in their eyes.
